posts.post_content: Errata actually changed its function. If it becomes an Artifact, it used to be able to be targeted by Enchant Artifact spells. Now it can't be enchanted by Auras that enchant artifacts.

posts.post_content:
This is really an old style big boss!  
6/5 for 6 was already not bad; with protection and vigilance this was a beast! Consider that being black he was already protected from most of removal (only direct damage and [Swords to Plowshares](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swords to Plowshares) could target him); with also partial protection against auras he was a badass beater!

posts.post_content:
Talk about taking an *axe* to the color pie!  
  
...  
  
But seriously folks, for no foe being able to slow Bartel's charge, he sure can be chumped all the way to Cape Tempest and back to Hammerheim.  
  
...  
  
But seriously folks, a 6/5 vigilant un-enchantable creature for ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) is pretty awesome, especially back in the day when [Shivan Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shivan Dragon)s and [Serra Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Serra Angel)s were the kings and queens of the game.  
  
Also, anyone else notice that the color order is reversed, as ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) instead of ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)? Oh Legends, you silly thing, you!
posts.html:
Talk about taking an axe to the color pie!

...

...
